i18n_privacy_policy_content.message:
# Privacy Policy

**Last Updated: 01 January 2026**

This Privacy Policy explains how our Browser Extension (the "Product") collects, uses, and discloses information when you use our services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a secure user experience.

## 1. Data Collection and Usage

We believe in data minimisation. The Product is designed to function primarily locally on your device.

* **User Content:** All sticky notes created by the user are stored locally on your device. To ensure your privacy, this data is encrypted using the storage API before being saved.
* **Active Tab & Host Information:** We use activeTab and host permissions (content_scripts) solely to identify the current website URL. This is necessary to render the correct sticky notes onto the specific host page and to ensure notes are displayed in-situ.
* **Operational Data:** We do not collect, track, or store your browsing history or personal identity information on any external servers.

## 2. Permissions Justification

To provide a seamless experience, the Product requires the following permissions:

* **Storage:** To facilitate the secure, encrypted storage of your notes.
* **ActiveTab:** To retrieve the current URL for context-aware note rendering.
* **ContextMenus:** To allow the rapid insertion of notes via the right-click menu.
* **SidePanel:** To provide a centralised hub for managing all your notes.
* **Host Permissions/Content Scripts:** To integrate and render the sticky note interface directly onto the host webpage.

## 3. Data Sharing and Disclosure

We do not share, sell, or trade your data with any third parties. All user data remains within the local environment of your browser. There are no external analytics or third-party tracking scripts embedded within the Product.

## 4. Data Security

We implement robust encryption methods to safeguard your data within the browser's storage. Since the data is stored locally, the security of your notes also depends on the security of your personal device.

## 5. Your Rights

You have full control over your data. You can view, edit, or delete your sticky notes at any time through the Product interface or by uninstalling the extension, which will remove all locally stored data associated with it.

## 6. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected by the "Last Updated" date at the top of this page.

## 7. Contact Us

If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us through:

**Email:** agjgj187076081@gmail.com

i18n_terms_of_service_content.message:
# Terms of Service

**Last Updated: 01 January 2026**

## 1. Acceptance of Terms

Welcome to our service. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by and comply with these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

## 2. Service Description

We provide browser extension services designed to enhance your productivity and user experience. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the service at any time without prior notice.

## 3. User Accounts

### 3.1 Account Registration

- You need to create an account to use certain features
- You must provide accurate, complete, and current information
- You are responsible for maintaining the security and confidentiality of your account information

### 3.2 Account Security

- You are responsible for protecting your account password
- You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized use
- You are responsible for all activities under your account

## 4. Usage Rules

### 4.1 Permitted Use

You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.

### 4.2 Prohibited Activities

You may not:

- Violate any applicable laws or regulations
- Infringe on intellectual property rights or other rights of others
- Distribute malware, viruses, or other harmful code
- Interfere with or disrupt the proper functioning of the service
- Access or attempt to access our systems without authorization
- Collect or store personal information of other users

## 5. Intellectual Property

### 5.1 Our Rights

The service and all its content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and software, are the property of us or our licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

### 5.2 Your Rights

You retain all rights to content you submit, post, or display through the service. By submitting content, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable license to use, reproduce, modify, distribute, and publicly display such content.

## 6. Privacy Protection

We value your privacy. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Using our service constitutes your agreement to our Privacy Policy.

## 7. Disclaimers

### 7.1 Service Provision

The service is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We do not warrant that the service will:

- Meet your specific requirements
- Be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free
- Provide accurate or reliable results
- Correct any errors

### 7.2 Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data loss, or business interruption.

## 8. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold us harmless from any claims, losses, liabilities, damages, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising from:

- Your use or misuse of the service
- Your violation of these Terms of Service
- Your infringement of any third party's rights

## 9. Termination

### 9.1 Our Termination

We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, at any time, for any reason or no reason, without prior notice.

### 9.2 Your Termination

You may terminate this agreement at any time by ceasing to use the service or deleting your account.

## 10. Modification of Terms

We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Significant changes will be communicated through in-service notifications or email. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

## 11. Governing Law

These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China. Any disputes shall be resolved through amicable negotiation; if negotiation fails, they shall be submitted to the people's court with jurisdiction in our location.

## 12. Contact Information

If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through:

**Email:** agjgj187076081@gmail.com

## 13. Miscellaneous Provisions

### 13.1 Entire Agreement

These Terms of Service constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding the use of the service and supersede all prior agreements.

### 13.2 Severability

If any provision of these Terms of Service is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.

### 13.3 Waiver

Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms of Service shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision.
